### Government Tender Announcement

#### Automated Tissue Homogenizer and Cell Lyser

###### Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAC) at the Summerland Research and Development Centre (SRDC) in British Columbia require a reliable automated tissue homogenizer and cell lyser to support their research activities.

###### Scope

The required equipment will be used in various laboratory settings to process biological samples, ensuring high-quality preparation of materials for further analysis.

###### Notice Details

*   Tender Reference Number:            WS3806825901-Doc3806887117
*   Tender Number:                      WS3806825901
*   Amendment Number:                   1
*   Publication Date:                   January 14, 2023

###### Contract Details

###### Contracting Entity

*   Contact Information:

    *   Email:                            clara.dumay@tpsgc.pwgsc.gc.ca

###### Notice URL

*   http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15128246?extsite=MTUxMjgyNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The automation of tissue homogenization is essential for various research activities in the Summerland Research and Development Centre. Therefore, we require an efficient and reliable automated tissue homogenizer and cell lyser system for the preparation of biological samples.
